statements: SELECT * FROM printer_maintenance WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task, issues FROM printer_maintenance WHERE frequency = 'Weekly';
SELECT id, task, frequency FROM printer_maintenance WHERE task LIKE '%toner%';
SELECT * FROM printer_maintenance WHERE frequency = 'Monthly' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT task, frequency FROM printer_maintenance WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT id, task FROM printer_maintenance WHERE frequency='Daily';
SELECT * FROM printer_maintenance WHERE id=3;
SELECT id, task, issues FROM printer_maintenance WHERE task LIKE '%toner%';
SELECT * FROM printer_maintenance WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT task, issues FROM printer_maintenance WHERE task='Replace Parts' AND issues IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT task_name, issues_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT task_name, frequency, issues_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE '%maintenance%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'Daily';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM maintenance_history JOIN maintenance_tasks ON maintenance_history.task_id = maintenance_tasks.task_id GROUP BY task_name;
SELECT technician_name, notes FROM maintenance_history WHERE task_id IN (SELECT task_id FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency = 'Weekly');
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks;
SELECT task_name, next_due_date FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceIssues ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT issue_description, reported_by FROM MaintenanceIssues WHERE reported_by='John Smith';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY task_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, last_completed_date FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE next_due_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_completed_date ASC;
SELECT issue_description, reported_by FROM MaintenanceIssues WHERE reported_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT printer_serial_number, maintenance_date FROM PrinterRecords WHERE maintenance_notes LIKE '%replacement%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT mt.task_name, pr.printer_serial_number FROM MaintenanceTasks mt JOIN PrinterRecords pr ON mt.task_id = pr.maintenance_task_id WHERE mt.frequency = 30 ORDER BY mt.task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency > 5;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE issue_encountered IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_name, issue_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT task_name, issue_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC, frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency >= 5 ORDER BY task_name ASC
SELECT task_name, issue_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency < 3
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE issue_encountered LIKE '%broken%'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE issue_encountered IS NOT NULL AND frequency BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT task_name, frequency, issue_encountered FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY frequency DESC, task_name
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceTasks ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE frequency >= '1 month' ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, issue_description FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE LENGTH(issue_description) > 50;
SELECT task_name, issue_description FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE issue_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY task_id ASC;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(task_name) < 10 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT printer_name, manufacturer FROM Printers WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_name, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT performance_status, performed_at FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE task_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND completion_status = true;
SELECT issue_description, reported_at FROM MaintenanceIssues WHERE printer_id = 5 AND issue_description LIKE '%paper jam%';
